summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Weed and Seed Program; increasing certain expenditure allowances in the 1993 budgets of the Health Department, Police Department, Department of Parks and Recreation and Department of Housing and Human Services for the conduct of Weed and Seed Community Programs by reappropriation and transfer from the 1993 Budget of the Department of Finance General for such purposes.
note: Related to Weed and Seed Program
